issue.title: multisense camera images do not always publish

content.raw: Yes.  It appears that if I launch Gazebo and let it come up fully before trying to launch my robot control and perception code, then it works most all the time.  If I have a combined launch file, then it doesn't.  So presumably this won't be an issue for the sim machines, but i an issue for normal use where we run 1 launch file on a local computer for testing instead of 3 or 4 launch files that represent 3-4 cloud machines.
content.html: Yes. It appears that if I launch Gazebo and let it come up fully before trying to launch my robot control and perception code, then it works most all the time. If I have a combined launch file, then it doesn't. So presumably this won't be an issue for the sim machines, but i an issue for normal use where we run 1 launch file on a local computer for testing instead of 3 or 4 launch files that represent 3-4 cloud machines.
